ALPHANUM_REQUIRED: Correct alphanumeric value is required (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, _ or -)
SEOURI_REQUIRED: Correct alphanumeric value is required (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, _, - or .)
ROLE_REQUIRED: Correct role code is required (ROLE_ followed by A-Z or _)
NUM_REQUIRED: Correct numeric value is required (e.g. -1, 0, 33 ... etc)
POS_INT_REQUIRED: Correct positive numeric value is required (e.g. 1, 5, 33 ... etc)
POS_DECIMAL_REQUIRED: Correct positive numeric value is required (e.g. 1, 1.5, 5, 33.0 ... etc)
DATE_REQUIRED: Correct date value is required. E.g. 3rd Jan 2017 should be entered as 2017-01-03. Time is optional and should be three double digits (hours, minutes, seconds) separated by colon. E.g. 02:43:00
NON_BLANK_TRIMMED_REQUIRED: Correct value is required (no preceding or tailing spaces)
COUNTRY_CODE_REQUIRED: Two letter country code is required (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
COUNTRY_ISO_REQUIRED: Three number country code is required (ISO 3166-1 numeric)
VALIDATION_URL: Valid URL, IP or 'localhost' is required
URI_REQUIRED: Valid URI is required (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, _ or -)
UNIQUE_REQUIRED: This value has already been used. Please choose another.
TAGS_REQUIRED: Tags must be separated by space and should be one word. E.g. 'onetag another third123'
TAX_REQUIRED: Valid tax rate is required, a number from 0 to 100
SAVEDOBJECT_REQUIRED: To display this information please save the main data first
FILTER_REQUIRED: This panel requires filter to display results. Please type search phrase into filter input.
FILTER_CAPPED: Too many results for given filter. Results have been capped.
SHOP_SELECTION_REQUIRED: This view requires shop selection. Please click the button to choose.
FULFILMENT_CENTRE_SELECTION_REQUIRED: This view requires fulfilment centre selection. Please click the button to choose.
CURRENCY_SELECTION_REQUIRED: This view requires currency selection. Please click the button to choose.
LICENSE_TITLE: YOU HAVE AGREED TO THE FOLLOWING:
MODAL_ERROR_MESSAGE_AUTH200: There was an error on server call, it could be that your session expired and you need to log in
MODAL_ERROR_MESSAGE_AUTH403: You are not authorised to view and/or update data
MODAL_ERROR_MESSAGE_AUTH404: Server error: Service path not found
MODAL_ERROR_MESSAGE_UNIQUE: Data constrain violation occurred. (e.g. CODE, GUID, URI, data relationship)
MODAL_CONFIRM_MSG: Please confirm that you wish to proceed
MODAL_CONFIRM_MSG_OFF: Please confirm that you wish to proceed with on/off action for {{value}}
MODAL_CONFIRM_MSG_PWD_RESET: Please confirm that you wish to proceed with password reset for {{value}}
MODAL_CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete {{value}} ?
MODAL_UPLOAD_DISABLED: Your device does not support file upload
MODAL_BUTTON_IMPEXFILES: Refresh list of files on server
MODAL_BUTTON_RESETPASSWORD: Reset password (sends email with new password)
MODAL_BUTTON_DELIVERYPACK: Mark delivery as packing (items are being prepared)
MODAL_BUTTON_DELIVERYSHIP: Mark delivery as ready for shipping (items are ready)
MODAL_BUTTON_DELIVERYSHIPPED: Mark delivery as completed (items left fulfilment centre)
MODAL_BUTTON_DELIVERYSHIPPEDOFFLINE: Mark delivery as completed and payment taken (items left fulfilment centre)
NAME: Name
ATTRIBUTE_USAGE_NONE: Attribute is not used by any product Type
ATTRIBUTE_SI_TIP: Search index flags can be changed in attribute management in 'System > Attributes'
SHOP_MISCONFIGURED: This shop has not been fully setup yet. Red labels denote mandatory settings that are missing.
SAVEDSHOP_REQUIRED: To create new shop please fill in the details on the 'Main' tab. There are several important configurations required before your shop can be operational. Once main details are saved this overview will help you identify what active settings are and what settings are missing.
SUBSHOP_TIP: Creating sub shops will enable B2B profile for this shop. Each sub shop can have its own catalog, shipping and fulfilment options. Prices for all sub shops are defined in master shop.
CARRIERSLA_EXCLUDE_DATES_ONE: Single date (first field), or range (both fields)
CATEGORY_LINK: This category is a link to
CONTENT_TEMPLATE_content: Default content displayed as is (plain HTML)
CONTENT_TEMPLATE_dynocontent: Dynamic content is preprocessed by template parser and can contain dynamic code elements
CONTENT_TEMPLATE_include: Includes are hidden from public access and are only available from within page templates. Can also be used to cap the parent hierarchy for microsites.
REINDEX_MESSAGE: Re-indexing job will be run on the storefront in background to update product indices. This may take couple of minutes. Once the token is received status update will be checked every 15 seconds.
QUERY_NO_RESULTS: Query {{query}} did not return any results
PG_FEATURE_AUTH_SHIP: Authorisation is per delivery (default per order)
PRODUCT_TYPE_ATTR_NEW_DUPLICATE: Selected attribute is already assigned to this type
INVENTORY_ORDER_RESERVED: Orders where SKU {{ code }} is reserved
INVENTORY_ORDER_RESERVED_NONE: There are no orders with reserved SKU
PROMOTION_CONDITION_RULE_TEMPLATE_BUY_X_: Buy X quantity of item or more
PROMOTION_CONDITION_RULE_TEMPLATE_BUY_ON: Buy one of X, Y or Z (where X, Y and Z are product SKU)
PROMOTION_CONDITION_RULE_TEMPLATE_CUSTOM: Discount for customers with email containing X.com
PROMOTION_CONDITION_RULE_TEMPLATE_ITEM_T: Item total is more than X
PROMOTION_CONDITION_RULE_TEMPLATE_ORDER_: Order total is more than X
PROMOTION_COUPONS_GENERATE_TIP: To generate random code single use coupons do not enter code and enter the number of coupons to generate in usage limit, to generate multiple use coupon enter code and usage limit to specify how many times this coupon can be used
PROMOTION_ENABLED_TIP: This promotion is enabled, disable it to make changes
PROMOTION_COUPONS_TIP: This promotion is not coupon triggered, set it to coupon triggered to make changes
CUSTOMERORDER_DELIVERY_TIP: Delivery actions available. Click delivery link or item in a delivery link.
CUSTOMERORDER_EXPORT_BLOCK_TIP: Export blocking prevents this order from export. This could be due to a flow transition (order is in a state that should not be exported), or a manual blocking.
cancel.order: Do you want to cancel the order '{{order}}'?
cancel.order.offlinenote: Note: if this is offline payment mode please refund payments now
cancel.order.manual.refund: Do you want to refund transaction for order '{{order}}' manually?
cancel.order.manual.refund.offlinenote: Note: this is offline refund mode please refund payments now
cancel.order.refund: Refund for '{{order}}' is failed or is in processing state. Are you sure you would like to re-try request for refund?
approve.order: Do you want to approve the order '{{order}}'?
approve.order.offlinenote: Note: if this is offline payment mode please take payment now
return.order: Do you want to process return for the order '{{order}}'?
return.order.offlinenote: Note: if this is offline payment mode please refund payments now
pack.delivery: Do you want to mark delivery '{{order}}' as packing (i.e. preparing delivery for shipment)?
mark.ready.for.shipment: Do you want to mark delivery '{{order}}' as ready for shipping (i.e. all items are packed and ready to be shipped)?
start.shipment: Do you want to mark delivery '{{order}}' as shipping (i.e. items have left warehouse and on their way to the customer)?
start.shipment.manual.payment: Do you want to mark delivery '{{order}}' as shipping (i.e. items have left warehouse and on their way to the customer)?
start.shipment.manual.payment.offlinenot: Note: payment failed for this delivery, confirm payment has been taken manually
mark.shipped: Do you want to mark delivery '{{order}}' as delivered (i.e. delivery was confirmed by customer or courier)?
mark.shipped.offlinenote: Note: if this is offline payment then confirm that this has been collected
update.external.ref: Do you want to set reference for delivery '{{order}}' (e.g. tracking number)?
error.order.not.found: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} not found
error.delivery.not.found: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} is found, but it does not have delivery {{ params.value.p1 }}
error.delivery.in.wrong.state: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} delivery number {{ params.value.p1 }} in {{ params.value.p2 }} state, but required {{ params.value.p3 }}. Updated by {{ params.value.p4 }}
error.delivery.manual.no.notes: Manual operation for order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} delivery number {{ params.value.p1 }} requires transaction reference.
error.illegal.transition: Transition from {{ params.value.p0 }} to {{ params.value.p1 }} delivery state is illegal
error.delivery.transition.fatal: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} delivery number {{ params.value.p1 }} in {{ params.value.p2 }} state cannot be transitioned to {{ params.value.p3 }} state
error.order.cancel.fatal: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} cannot be cancelled
error.order.cancel.retry.fatal: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} cannot be cancelled. (Refund failed)
error.order.cancel.retry.manual.fatal: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} cannot be cancelled. (Manual refund failed)
error.order.cancel.retry.manual.fatal.no: Order with number {{ params.value.p0 }} cannot be cancelled because cancellation authorisation is missing. (Manual refund failed)
error.order.payment.confirm.fatal: Cannot confirm payment for order {{ params.value.p0 }}
CUSTOMER_TYPES_AVAILABLE: Supported types defined for accessible shops
CUSTOMER_RESET_MSG: Do you wish to reset customer password and send email notification on behalf of {{ shop }}?
IMPEX_NEW_TIP: Press plus button to add new task
IMPEX_UPDATES_TIP: Import/Export can take some time. Status updates will be received every 15 seconds
IMPEX_DOWNLOAD_TIP: Click download button to get the file
IMPEX_START_TIP: Press play button to run the task
REPORT_PARAM_fromDate: From (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, only year is mandatory)
REPORT_PARAM_tillDate: To (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, only year is mandatory)
REPORT_NO_RESULTS: No report was generated because there is no data for given report parameters
REPORT_SELECT_TIP: Select report and click plus button to generate the report
REPORT_RUN_TIP: Click play button to run generate this report
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_DEFAULT: Default order search is searching: order number, email and last name in open orders only
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_OPEN: Open order search does regular search in open orders.
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_CANCELLED: Cancelled order search does regular search in cancelled or returned orders.
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_PAYMENT: Payment order search does regular search in orders that are awaiting payment or refund.
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_COMPLETED: Completed order search does regular search in orders that are completed.
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_NUMBER: To search only by order number. Format: '#ordernumber'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_ID: To search only by order ID. Format: '*ID'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_CUSTOMER: To search only by customer details (email, first name and last name). Format: '?keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_ADDRESS: To search only by address details. Format: '@keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ORDERS_RESERVED: To search orders where SKU is reserved and pending allocation (exact match). Format: '!SKU'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCTTYPE_ATTR_SI: To list attributes that have search index flags use '#SI'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCTTYPE_ATTR_VISIBLE: To list attributes that are visible use '+V'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCTTYPE_ATTR_INVISIBLE: To list attributes that are invisible use '-V'
SEARCH_HELP_PRICELIST_DEFAULT: Default prices search is partial by SKU code/name or product code/name
SEARCH_HELP_PRICELIST_EXACT: To search for exact SKU (code, PIM code, barcode or manufacturer code): Format: !SKU
SEARCH_HELP_PRICELIST_TAG: To search prices by tag or policy use #tag or #policy
SEARCH_HELP_INVENTORY_DEFAULT: Default inventory search is partial by SKU code/name or product code/name
SEARCH_HELP_INVENTORY_EXACT: To search for exact SKU (code, PIM code, barcode or manufacturer code): Format: !SKU
SEARCH_HELP_INVENTORY_LOW: To search for low inventory use '-quantity'. E.g. to show inventory less than 5 units '-5'
SEARCH_HELP_INVENTORY_RESERVED: To search for reserved inventory use '+quantity'. E.g. to show reservations more than than 2 units '+2'
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_DEFAULT: Default order search is searching: order/delivery number, name on card and payment gateway name
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_NUMBER: To search only by reference number (order/delivery number, transaction ref/token/auth). Format: '#reference'
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_CUSTOMER: To search only by customer details (name on card, card number and IP). Format: '?keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_DETAILS: To search only by transaction operation details (operation, result code and message). Format: '@keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_STATUS_PENDING: Pending payments search does regular search in processing, failed or manual required payments.
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_STATUS_FAILED: Failed payments search does regular search in failed or manual required payments.
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_STATUS_COMPLETED: Completed payments search does regular search in successful payments.
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_INCOMING: Incoming payments search does combined search.
SEARCH_HELP_PAYMENT_OUTGOING: Outgoing payments search does combined search.
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_DEFAULT: Default customer search is searching: email, first name, last name, type and policy
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_NUMBER: To search only by customer reference (code, email or tag). Format: '#ref'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_CUSTOMER: To search only by customer details (email, first name and last name). Format: '?keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS: To search only by address details. Format: '@keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_CUSTOMER_POLICY: To search only by type or policy. Format: '$keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_TAX_DEFAULT: Default tax search is by code or description
SEARCH_HELP_TAX_RATE: To search only rate. Format: '%rate' e.g. '%20'
SEARCH_HELP_TAX_TYPE: To search only Gross/Net tax. Format: '+grosskeyword' or '-netkeyword', use '++' or '--' for all. Can be combined with rate e.g. Gross taxation of 20%: '+%20'
SEARCH_HELP_TAXCFG_LOCATION: To search only by location (country code exact, state code partial). Format: '@keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_TAXCFG_SKU: To search only by SKU. Format: '#SKU'. Use '#!' to select all non-SKU configurations
SEARCH_HELP_TAXCFG_SKU_EXACT: To search for exact SKU (code, PIM code, barcode or manufacturer code): Format: !SKU
SEARCH_HELP_PROMOTION_DEFAULT: Default promotion search is by code, name and description
SEARCH_HELP_PROMOTION_CODE: To search only code or tag. Format: '#tag'
SEARCH_HELP_PROMOTION_TYPE: To search only promotion type or action. Format: '!id' where id can be: O - Order, S - Shipping, I - Product item, C - Customer tag, F - Fixed value off, P - Percentage off, G - Gifts and T - Customer tag
SEARCH_HELP_PROMOTION_CONDITION: To search only promotion condition. Format: '?keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PROMOTION_ENABLED: To search only enabled/disabled use '+' or '-'. Format: '+#tag' or '++' for all enabled
SEARCH_HELP_CONTENT_DEFAULT: Default content search is by code, name and URI
SEARCH_HELP_CONTENT_PARENT: To search for content including its immediate children. Format: '^keyword', where keyword is code, name or URI
SEARCH_HELP_CONTENT_URI: To search only URI use '@'. Format: '@URI'
SEARCH_HELP_CATEGORY_DEFAULT: Default category search is by code, name and URI
SEARCH_HELP_CATEGORY_PARENT: To search for category including its immediate children. Format: '^keyword', where keyword is code, name or URI
SEARCH_HELP_CATEGORY_URI: To search only URI use '@'. Format: '@URI'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_DEFAULT: Default product search is by code, manufacturer code, PIM code, name and description
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_EXACT: To search for exact SKU (code, PIM code, barcode or manufacturer code): Format: '!SKU'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_CODE: To search only code, manufacturer code, PIM code or tag. Format: '#tag'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_TYPE: To search only by brand or product type. Format: '?keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_CATEGORY: To search only by category name or code. Format: '^keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_TYPE_DEFAULT: Default product type search is by code, name and description
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_TYPE_EXACT: To search for exact code (code or name): Format: '!keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE: To search for type by attribute code (exact): Format: '#code'
SEARCH_HELP_ASSOCIATION_TYPE: To search by association type. Format: '#keyword'
SEARCH_HELP_ATTRIBUTE_CODE: To search attribute by code with exact matching. Format: '#X'
SEARCH_HELP_AV_VALUES: To display all existing values use '###'
SEARCH_HELP_AV_VALUES_NEW: To display all non blank values use '##0'
SEARCH_HELP_CACHE_TOP: To display top X used caches. Format: '^X'
SEARCH_HELP_CACHE_SIZE: To display caches with X or more elements. Format: '#X'
SEARCH_HELP_CALENDAR: To search by date use the < character with dates after (on left) or before (on right). E.g: 'before 2000': <2000, 'after sep 2000 before 2017': 2000-09<2017
